description:
Eva and Turi find themselves having to accompany Main to Corinna`s residence, because she wants to take a look at the outfit Main wore for her baptism.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gaiden Dainishou: Corinna-sama no Otaku Houmon
Side Story Two: Visiting Missus Corinna
القصة الجانبية الثانية: زيارة السيّدة كورينا
外伝第二章・コリンナ様のお宅訪問
